name: Givaudan SA
description: Givaudan SA is a global leader in the flavor and fragrance industry, dedicated to enhancing the sensory experience of consumers through innovative products. Founded in 1895 in Switzerland, Givaudan has built a rich heritage of creativity and expertise in developing scents and tastes that delight consumers across various sectors, including food and beverage, personal care, and household products. The company operates in over 100 countries and employs more than 15,000 people worldwide, leveraging its strong research and development capabilities to create unique and sustainable solutions tailored to customer needs. Givaudan is committed to sustainability, focusing on responsible sourcing, reducing environmental impact, and promoting social responsibility. Through its Taste & Wellbeing and Fragrance & Beauty segments, Givaudan continuously strives to inspire customers with innovative product offerings while maintaining a strong ethical foundation. The company invests significantly in R&D, ensuring a pipeline of cutting-edge innovations that meet the evolving preferences of consumers. Givaudan’s mission is to create a positive impact on the world while delivering exceptional value to its stakeholders.
